title: Online Case Analysis Discussion: Constructivist Approach for Social Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social issue analysis skills and foundational practical experience in professional fields
context.additional_context: Case-based discussions in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, combining real-time video conferences with text-based forums. Structured discussion guides provided to facilitate learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social issues to derive three or more core issues and stakeholder perspectives.
Learners can collaboratively propose and provide feedback on problem-solving solutions with peers in text-based discussion platforms.
Learners can present two or more actionable strategies applicable to their professional practice based on case analysis results.

resources: Moodle or alternative text forum platform
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
